article_title: Deaths also reported near hospital near Rafah in the south.
sentence: But  we're  also  getting  reports  of  more  than  a  dozen  people  killed  near  a  hospital  in  southern  Gaza.

article_title: Deaths also reported near hospital near Rafah in the south.
sentence: According  to  Wafa,  an  official  Palestinian  news  agency,  15  people  were  killed,  including  children  and  women,  after  homes  were  bombed  near  Abu  Youssef  Al-Najjar  Hospital  in  Rafah.
